data.title: Ewos Said to Buy Chile’s Nova Austral for $183 Million
data.meta_description: Ewos AS, a Norwegian fish feed supplier that is partially owned by Bain Capital LLC, agreed to buy Chile’s Nova Austral out of bankruptcy, according to four people with direct knowledge of the matter.
data.text:
Ewos AS, a Norwegian fish feed supplier that is partially owned by Bain Capital LLC, agreed to buy Chile’s Nova Austral out of bankruptcy, according to four people with direct knowledge of the matter.

The $183 million agreement signed on Sept. 5 in Santiago includes about $180 million in liabilities, said the people, who asked not to be named because details aren’t yet public. The deal will be completed in about three weeks, they said.
